title: Kendall Jenner's surprising turtleneck gown divides the internet
text:
Kendall Jenner is known for her dramatic fashion choices, and her appearance at the 71st Primetime Emmy Awards was no exception.

The 23-year-old model appeared on the Primetime Emmys’ purple carpet for the first time alongside older sister Kim Kardashian, and the duo later stepped on stage to present the award for best reality show.

(Photo by J.Emilio Flores/Invision for FIJI/AP Images) More

Dressed in a floral Richard Quinn gown, Jenner’s sartorial choice had many fans scratching their heads as her latex turtleneck seemed slightly out of place alongside the feminine ball gown.

“What in God’s name is Kendall Jenner wearing?” asked one puzzled viewer.

no one:

kendall jenner borrowing the rubber suit from ahs at the emmys: pic.twitter.com/kipgr4aAIi — sierra (@silknstyles) September 23, 2019

We're 20 minutes behind, but is Kendall Jenner wearing the Venom suit underneath her dress? #Emmys2019 — Jeremy Hellwig (@JeremyHellwig) September 23, 2019

Another compared her bold look to “an alien in men in black trying to pass as human.”

Twitter is great cause when you see something funny on tv, by the time you open the app theres already a ton of funny tweets about it, like how kendall Jenner on the Emmys looks like an alien in men in black trying to pass as human. — Breck McMichael (@BSMcMichael) September 23, 2019

Hot take Kendall Jenner looks like a mermaid caught in an oil spill #Emmys2019 pic.twitter.com/dU7vFV7PwT — Aliza Schaffer (@SchafferAliza) September 23, 2019

Just tuned in. Why does Kendall Jenner look like a dominatrix that put her gown on over her work uniform? #Emmys — Afro Bo Peep (@AfroBoPeep) September 23, 2019

Fans of the Kardashian-Jenner clan were quick to jump in with words of encouragement for Kendall’s risk-taking look.

Regardless of whether you loved it or hated it, there’s no denying that Kendall’s head-turning look got audiences talking, generating plenty of buzz for designer Richard Quinn’s straight-off the runway look.

Fresh off the runway: @KendallJenner wears Richard Quinn's Spring 2020 collection at the 2019 #Emmys. See every red carpet arrival here: https://t.co/X6a7iIidsq pic.twitter.com/feQgaiwWjF — Vogue Runway (@VogueRunway) September 23, 2019

Let us know what you think by commenting below and tweeting @YahooStyleCA!

Follow us on Twitter and Instagram.
description: “What in God’s name is Kendall Jenner wearing?”
